meanings.definition: To sleep or take a nap.
meanings.sent1: After a long day at the park, the tired puppy was kipping in its cozy bed.
meanings.sent2: I love kipping on lazy Sunday afternoons.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to start kipping right in the middle of the family dinner.
meanings.sent4: The kipping squirrel looked so peaceful on the tree branch.
meanings.sent5: She was caught kipping during the boring lecture.

meanings.sent1: After finishing his homework, he was kipping on the couch.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy kipping by the fireplace on chilly evenings.
meanings.sent3: The old dog was happily kipping in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The flowers were kipping in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: She found herself kipping in the hammock under the stars.

meanings.definition: To engage in a specific type of pull-up exercise.
meanings.sent1: The athlete was kipping during the CrossFit workout.
meanings.sent2: I need to practice my kipping technique at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The monkey at the zoo was kipping effortlessly on the bars.
meanings.sent4: She watched in amazement as he performed perfect kipping pull-ups.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast's kipping form was flawless during the routine.
